files.description: Single-page patient-facing EHI export overview. Lists 22 C-CDA sections included in the export and explains what a CCDA file is. This is the primary (b)(10) documentation — a patient-facing overview of the Email/Print Chart + CCDA download mechanism.

Single-page CURES disclosure document with MFA and EHI sections. The EHI section states exports use CCDA/XML format via Email/Print Chart, can be done for individual or groups of patients or scheduled, without charge or programming intervention.

9-page mandatory disclosure table listing all certified capabilities, descriptions, and associated costs. Contains entries for (b)(6) Data export and (b)(10) EHI export — both describe C-CDA-based export of clinical data. Provides context on all product capabilities and pricing model.
Full-page screenshot of the registered CHPL documentation URL showing the 'Certifications & Documentation' page with three button-links to the PDF documents.
